original_title: Walt Disney Treasures - The Mickey Mouse Club
overview: "M-I-C--K-E-Y--M-O-U-S-E." Before the theme song's memorable spelling became an audio icon, before the series even aired, the Mickey Mouse Club was the most anticipated children's programming ever. This volume features the five episodes of week one of the black-and-white series that launched a television revolution.
title: Walt Disney Treasures - The Mickey Mouse Club
